import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import './products.scss' import coverPic from '../../assests/images/products.avif' import Card from '../../components/Card/Card' // import { data } from '../../data' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import fetchAPI from '../../services/fetchAPI' const Products = () => { const [selectedRange, setSelectedRange] = useState(4000); const [selectedCatogary, setSelectedCatogary] = useState('') const [sortyBy, setSortby] = useState() const [data, setData] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { const fechData = async () => { const data = await fetchAPI(`http://localhost:4001/getproductsbytype?type=${selectedCatogary.toLowerCase()}`) setData(data.products) } fechData() console.log(data) }, [selectedCatogary]); const categoryArray = data?.map((item) => item.category) return (

{data?.filter((product) => { return product.price <= selectedRange }) .sort((a, b) => sortyBy === 'lowest' ? a.price - b.price : sortyBy === 'Highest' ? b.price - a.price : console.log) .map((item) => { return ( < React.Fragment key={item._id.toString()}> ) })}
) } export default Products
